QuestData.Title: The Stormwind Extraction
QuestData.Description:
My lady is shrewd indeed. If we are to infiltrate Stormwind City, we will need the very best the Horde has to offer, and yet a team so small as to be able to infiltrate the heart of Alliance territory unseen.
<Nathanos peers at the gathered group, stroking his chin.>
Yes, I see.
The path ahead is clear. Speak to me when you are ready to undertake the Warchief's mission, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, here we are. Zuldazar. We had better stick with Talanji and Zul for now. The Warchief will be interested to know what happens next.
